snippet: The shop, in Manhattan’s flower district, carries items including faux flowers and plastic champagne glasses.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Lasting Art, storefront offering large selection of silk flowers and special party items in Chelsea section of Manhattan; popular holdout for designers is nestled in the heart of what remains of New York City's once-extensive floral district.
lead_paragraph: The shop, in Manhattan’s flower district, carries items including faux flowers and plastic champagne glasses.

headline.main: Lasting Art, a Flower Store Where Everything Is 100% Fake
